descriptionHtml:
EmulatesÂ the player saying a certain voice set chosen by the esp.
An NPC that you cannot see and doesn't get in your way will say whichever voice set you choose.
There is over 90 voice sets in this file. ONLY USE ONE ESP VOICE AT A TIME
NO REQUIREMENTS, NOT EVEN SKSE. :D

SIDENOTE:
I havent tested all the voices, Voices like Dagon wont have much effect. Ill still leave them in the file for reference.
For mods that might add voicesets upon these voices.

Create Your Own Voice Set Optional:
Modders resource that allows you to put in your own voicesets and upload them "Aslong as you credit me".

If you run into any problems disable mod save reenable refresh cell
If you get stuck jump over npc

PLEASE UPGRADE TO V1.1 MORE RESPONSES!. :)
IF YOU WANT TO HEAR THE VOICES USE BSA EXTRACTOR TO EXTRACT THE VOICES INTO A FILE THEN UNFUZZER ON NEXUS TO TURN THEM INTO WAV
I BELIEVE THAT UPLOADING SUCH A THING WOULD PUT MYSELF IN DANGER OF COPYWRITE INFRINGMENT SO IF YOU WANT TO HEAR THE VOICES DO THIS
author: thelawfull
